title: Nonaqueous electrolyte and nonaqueous secondary battery

events.title: Application filed by Asahi Chemical Co Ltd

classifications.description: Accumulators with non-aqueous electrolyte characterised by the materials used as electrolytes, e.g. mixed inorganic/organic electrolytes
Liquid materials characterised by the solutes
Rocking-chair batteries, i.e. batteries with lithium insertion or intercalation in both electrodes; Lithium-ion batteries
Liquid materials characterised by the additives
Liquid materials characterised by the solvents
Organic electrolyte characterised by the solvent
Manufacturing or production processes characterised by the final manufactured product
Energy storage systems for electromobility, e.g. batteries

abstract: The non-aqueous electrolytic solution of the present invention is a non-aqueous electrolytic solution containing acetonitrile and a lithium salt. The anion of the aforementioned lithium salt has LUMO (lowest unoccupied orbital) energy in the range of -2.00 to 4.35eV, and has an energy of -5.35 to -2.90eV have HOMO (highest occupied orbital) energies in the range of .
abstract_original: 本发明的非水系电解液是含有乙腈和锂盐的非水系电解液，前述锂盐的阴离子在-2.00～4.35eV的范围内具有LUMO（最低空轨道）能量、且在-5.35～-2.90eV的范围内具有HOMO（最高占有轨道）能量。
claims: 1.一种非水系电解液，其含有乙腈和有机锂盐，所述有机锂盐的阴离子在-2.00～4.35eV的范围内具有最低空轨道LUMO能量、且在-5.35～-2.90eV的范围内具有最高占有轨道HOMO能量。1. A non-aqueous electrolyte, which contains acetonitrile and an organic lithium salt, the anion of the organic lithium salt has the lowest empty orbital LUMO energy in the range of -2.00 to 4.35eV, and is in the range of -5.35 to -2.90eV It has the highest occupied orbital HOMO energy.

2.根据权利要求1所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述有机锂盐的阴离子在-1.00～2.70eV的范围内具有最低空轨道LUMO能量、且在-4.50～-3.00eV的范围内具有最高占有轨道HOMO能量。2. The non-aqueous electrolyte solution according to claim 1, wherein the anion of the organolithium salt has the lowest unoccupied orbital LUMO energy in the range of -1.00 to 2.70eV, and in the range of -4.50 to -3.00eV It has the highest occupied orbital HOMO energy.

3.根据权利要求1或2所述的非水系电解液，其中，相对于所述非水系电解液的总量，所述有机锂盐的含量为0.1～30质量%。3. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 1 or 2, wherein the content of the organolithium salt is 0.1 to 30% by mass relative to the total amount of the nonaqueous electrolytic solution.

4.根据权利要求1～3中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，相对于扣除所述有机锂盐的所述非水系电解液所含成分的总量，所述乙腈的含量为70～100体积%。4. according to the non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 3, wherein, relative to the total amount of components contained in the non-aqueous electrolytic solution deducting the organic lithium salt, the content of the acetonitrile is 70-100% by volume.
5.根据权利要求1～3中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其还含有无机锂盐。5. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 3, further comprising an inorganic lithium salt.
6.根据权利要求5所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述无机锂盐是具有氟原子的化合物。6. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 5, wherein the inorganic lithium salt is a compound having a fluorine atom.

7.根据权利要求5或6所述的非水系电解液，其中，相对于所述非水系电解液的总量，所述无机锂盐的含量为0.1～40质量%。7. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 5 or 6, wherein the content of the inorganic lithium salt is 0.1 to 40% by mass relative to the total amount of the non-aqueous electrolytic solution.

8.根据权利要求5～7中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，相对于扣除所述有机锂盐及所述无机锂盐的所述非水系电解液所含成分的总量，所述乙腈的含量为70～100体积%。8. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 5 to 7, wherein, relative to the total amount of components contained in the non-aqueous electrolytic solution excluding the organic lithium salt and the inorganic lithium salt, The content of the acetonitrile is 70-100% by volume.
9.根据权利要求5～8中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述无机锂盐是具有磷原子的化合物。9. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 5 to 8, wherein the inorganic lithium salt is a compound having a phosphorus atom.
10.根据权利要求5～9中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述无机锂盐是LiPF6。10. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 5 to 9, wherein the inorganic lithium salt is LiPF 6 .

11.根据权利要求5～10中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述有机锂盐和所述无机锂盐满足下述式（1）所示的条件，11. The non-aqueous electrolyte solution according to any one of claims 5 to 10, wherein the organic lithium salt and the inorganic lithium salt satisfy the conditions shown in the following formula (1),
      
      
         0.05≤X≤1·····（1）0.05≤X≤1·····(1)
      
      
         式（1）中，X是所述无机锂盐相对于所述有机锂盐的含有摩尔比。In the formula (1), X is the content molar ratio of the inorganic lithium salt to the organic lithium salt.

12.根据权利要求1～11中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其还含有在-3.00～0.90eV的范围内具有最低空轨道LUMO能量的非腈系添加剂。12. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 11, further comprising a non-nitrile additive having the lowest unoccupied orbital LUMO energy in the range of -3.00 to 0.90 eV.

13.根据权利要求12所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述在-3.00～0.90eV的范围内具有最低空轨道LUMO能量的非腈系添加剂在-9.55～-6.00eV的范围内具有最高占有轨道HOMO能量。13. The non-aqueous electrolyte according to claim 12, wherein the non-nitrile additive having the lowest unoccupied orbital LUMO energy in the range of -3.00 to 0.90eV has the highest LUMO energy in the range of -9.55 to -6.00eV Occupies orbital HOMO energy.

14.根据权利要求12所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述在-3.00～0.90eV的范围内具有最低空轨道LUMO能量的非腈系添加剂在-8.50～-7.25eV的范围内具有最高占有轨道HOMO能量。14. The non-aqueous electrolyte according to claim 12, wherein the non-nitrile additive having the lowest unoccupied orbital LUMO energy in the range of -3.00 to 0.90eV has the highest LUMO energy in the range of -8.50 to -7.25eV Occupies orbital HOMO energy.

15.根据权利要求12～14中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，相对于所述非水系电解液的总量，所述非腈系添加剂的含量为0.1～30质量%。15. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 12 to 14, wherein the content of the non-nitrile additive is 0.1 to 30% by mass relative to the total amount of the nonaqueous electrolytic solution.

16.根据权利要求12～15中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，相对于所述非水系电解液的总量，所述非腈系添加剂的含量为0.1～10质量%。16 . The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 12 , wherein the content of the non-nitrile additive is 0.1 to 10% by mass relative to the total amount of the nonaqueous electrolytic solution.
17.根据权利要求12～16中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其含有2种以上的所述非腈系添加剂。17. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 12 to 16, which contains two or more of the non-nitrile additives.

18.根据权利要求12～17中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述非腈系添加剂包含选自由碳酸酯类组成的组中的1种以上的化合物。18. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 12 to 17, wherein the non-nitrile additive contains one or more compounds selected from the group consisting of carbonates.
19.根据权利要求18所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述碳酸酯类是环状碳酸酯。19. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 18, wherein the carbonates are cyclic carbonates.

20.根据权利要求18或19所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述碳酸酯类是具有碳碳间不饱和双键的化合物。20. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 18 or 19, wherein the carbonates are compounds having an unsaturated double bond between carbon and carbon.

21.根据权利要求12～20中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述非腈系添加剂包含选自由下述通式（2）所示化合物组成的组中的1种以上的化合物，21. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 12 to 20, wherein the non-nitrile additive comprises at least one selected from the group consisting of compounds represented by the following general formula (2): compound,
      
      
         R1-A-R2·····（2）R 1 -AR 2 ·····(2)
      
      
         式（2）中，R1和R2各自独立地表示任选被芳基或卤原子取代的烷基或者任选被烷基或卤原子取代的芳基，或者R1和R2相互键合且与A一起形成任选具有不饱和键的环状结构，A表示具有下述式（3）～（7）中任一式所示结构的2价基团，In formula (2), R 1 and R 2 each independently represent an alkyl group optionally substituted by an aryl group or a halogen atom or an aryl group optionally substituted by an alkyl group or a halogen atom, or R 1 and R 2 are bonded to each other And together with A, a ring structure optionally having an unsaturated bond is formed, and A represents a divalent group having a structure shown in any of the following formulas (3) to (7),

22.根据权利要求21所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述式（2）中，R1和R2各自独立地表示任选被苯基或卤原子取代的碳原子数1～4的烷基或者任选被卤原子取代的苯基，或者R1和R2相互键合且与A一起形成任选具有不饱和键的环状结构。22. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 21, wherein, in the formula (2), R 1 and R 2 each independently represent a carbon atom having 1 to 4 carbon atoms optionally substituted by a phenyl group or a halogen atom. An alkyl group or a phenyl group optionally substituted by a halogen atom, or R 1 and R 2 are bonded to each other and together with A form a cyclic structure optionally having an unsaturated bond.

23.根据权利要求21或22所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述式（2）所示化合物包含选自由亚硫酸亚乙酯、亚硫酸亚丙酯、亚硫酸亚丁酯、亚硫酸亚戊酯、环丁砜、3-甲基环丁砜、3-环丁烯砜、1,3-丙烷磺内酯、1,4-丁烷磺内酯、1,3-丙二醇硫酸酯和四亚甲基亚砜组成的组中的1种以上的化合物。23. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 21 or 22, wherein the compound represented by the formula (2) comprises a compound selected from the group consisting of ethylene sulfite, propylene sulfite, butylene sulfite, sulfite Pentyl esters, sulfolane, 3-methylsulfolane, 3-sulfolene, 1,3-propane sultone, 1,4-butane sultone, 1,3-propanediol sulfate, and tetramethylene sultone One or more compounds in the group consisting of sulfones.

24.根据权利要求1～23中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述有机锂盐是具有硼原子的有机锂盐。24. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 23, wherein the organolithium salt is an organolithium salt having a boron atom.

25.根据权利要求1～24中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述有机锂盐是具有有机配体的有机锂盐。25. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 24, wherein the organolithium salt is an organolithium salt having an organic ligand.

26.根据权利要求1～25中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述有机锂盐是选自由二草酸硼酸锂和草酸二氟硼酸锂组成的组中的1种以上的有机锂盐。26. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 25, wherein the organic lithium salt is one or more organic lithium salts selected from the group consisting of lithium dioxalate borate and lithium oxalate difluoroborate. Lithium salt.
27.根据权利要求1～26中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其还含有二腈化合物。27. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 26, further comprising a dinitrile compound.

28.根据权利要求27所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述二腈化合物包含选自由下述通式（8）所示化合物组成的组中的1种以上的化合物，28. The non-aqueous electrolyte according to claim 27, wherein the dinitrile compound comprises at least one compound selected from the group consisting of compounds represented by the following general formula (8),
      
      
         NC-(CR3R4)2a-CN·····（8）NC-(CR 3 R 4 ) 2a -CN·····(8)
      
      
         式（8）中，R3和R4各自独立地表示氢原子或烷基，a表示1～6的整数。In formula (8), R 3 and R 4 each independently represent a hydrogen atom or an alkyl group, and a represents an integer of 1-6.
29.根据权利要求1～28中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其还含有离子性化合物。29. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 28, further comprising an ionic compound.
30.根据权利要求29所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述离子性化合物的阳离子是具有氮原子的阳离子。30. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 29, wherein the cation of the ionic compound is a cation having a nitrogen atom.
31.根据权利要求30所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述具有氮原子的阳离子是吡啶鎓阳离子。31. The nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to claim 30, wherein the cation having a nitrogen atom is a pyridinium cation.
32.根据权利要求29～31中任一项所述的非水系电解液，其中，所述离子性化合物的阴离子是PF6 -。32. The non-aqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 29 to 31, wherein the anion of the ionic compound is PF 6 - .

33.一种非水系二次电池，其具备权利要求1～32中任一项所述的非水系电解液、正极和负极。33. A nonaqueous secondary battery comprising the nonaqueous electrolytic solution according to any one of claims 1 to 32, a positive electrode, and a negative electrode.

34.根据权利要求33所述的非水系二次电池，其中，所述正极含有选自由能够吸藏及释放锂离子的材料组成的组中的1种以上的材料作为正极活性物质，所述负极含有选自由能够吸藏及释放锂离子的材料和金属锂组成的组中的1种以上的材料作为负极活性物质。34. The non-aqueous secondary battery according to claim 33, wherein the positive electrode contains at least one material selected from the group consisting of materials capable of absorbing and releasing lithium ions as a positive electrode active material, and the negative electrode The negative electrode active material contains at least one material selected from the group consisting of materials capable of storing and releasing lithium ions and metallic lithium.

35.根据权利要求34所述的非水系二次电池，其中，所述正极含有含锂化合物作为所述正极活性物质。35. The non-aqueous secondary battery according to claim 34, wherein the positive electrode contains a lithium-containing compound as the positive electrode active material.

36.根据权利要求35所述的非水系二次电池，其中，所述含锂化合物包含选自由具有锂的金属氧化物和具有锂的金属硫属化合物组成的组中的1种以上的化合物。36 . The non-aqueous secondary battery according to claim 35 , wherein the lithium-containing compound contains at least one compound selected from the group consisting of lithium-containing metal oxides and lithium-containing metal chalcogenides.

37.根据权利要求34～36中任一项所述的非水系二次电池，其中，所述负极含有选自由金属锂、碳材料和含能够与锂形成合金的元素的材料组成的组中的1种以上的材料作为所述负极活性物质。37. The non-aqueous secondary battery according to any one of claims 34 to 36, wherein the negative electrode contains a material selected from the group consisting of lithium metal, carbon materials, and materials containing elements capable of forming alloys with lithium. One or more materials are used as the negative electrode active material.

38.根据权利要求34～37中任一项所述的非水系二次电池，其中，所述负极含有在低于0.4V vs.Li/Li+的电位下吸藏锂离子的材料作为所述负极活性物质。38. The non-aqueous secondary battery according to any one of claims 34 to 37, wherein the negative electrode contains a material that absorbs lithium ions at a potential lower than 0.4V vs. Li/Li + as the Negative active material.

39.一种非水系二次电池的制造方法，其是权利要求33～38中任一项所述的非水系二次电池的制造方法，具有进行0.001～0.3C的初次充电的工序。39. A method for producing a nonaqueous secondary battery, which is the method for producing a nonaqueous secondary battery according to any one of claims 33 to 38, comprising a step of performing initial charging at 0.001 to 0.3C.

40.根据权利要求39所述的非水系二次电池的制造方法，其中，所述初次充电在中途经由恒电压充电而进行。40. The method of manufacturing a non-aqueous secondary battery according to claim 39, wherein said initial charging is performed via constant voltage charging on the way.
